post.author: Heo, Hong
post.content:
Gartner research predicts :

By 2003, 75 percent of new IT application development projects will be based on Microsoftâ€™s .NET and enterprise Java architectures (0.7 probability).

By 2003, 50 percent or more of new IT application development projects will be based on enterprise Java architectures (0.3 probability).

As you see, Java is becoming a de facto platform for mainstream e-business solutions.

To get through slim career market in IT industry, as well as to alive as a strong survivor, Java developer can be a good candidate for these goals.

There are many special areas in computer-related jobs and many people wonder which one is comparably suitable to choose for me.

If you are not certain for your specialty, check this first, or if you already have a specialty in java, please skip to next :

- Web-oriented service(mandatory)
- Object-Oriented Programming(thorough understanding of OOD concept mandatory)
- SQL database programming(required)
- Oracle or RDBMS, Stored Procedure-PL/SQL(asset)
- Data modeling(optional)

If you already know Java or experienced in some period :- Intermediate Level :

- Servlet
- JSP(Java Server Page)
- Java Bean
- MVC(Model-View-Control) model(Jakarta Struts) on server-side
- JDBC programming
- EJB- Session Bean
- EJB- Entity Bean(CMP, BMP)
- XML
- Web session management - HttpSession, cookies, HTTP-rewrite
- IDE(Especially, JBuilder 4.0+)


Here is for Senior Java Developer :
- At least 3 years Java experience
- UML design and understaning skills are definetly asset
- Together ControlCenter(optional but asset)
- WebLogic or Websphere(practical experience)
- RMI
- JDBC connection pooling
- Multi-threaded programming
- Network programming(Java Mail, JNDI, Java Messaging)

Last, to be a Java Architect :

- RUP(Rational Unified Process) methodology
- UML analysis and design(Rational Rose)
- Together ControlCentor 5.* (for Senior Java Architect)
- At least 5 years industry experience in IT
- Thorough understaning of J2EE
- Strong documentation skill in English
- Strong presentation skill in English
- Being able to consume political issues within team organization
- Master degree is asset

I believe that most of interview questions are focused on those topics.
And please do not afraid of English sentences and try to be more familar with English environment. That's why I wrote it in English even though I'm not fluent. I always try to use and use until I've got accustomed to.

DH
Sr. Java Architect in BCE.
post.title: A tip to get a job for Java Developer
